title: Economic Activity Intensifies Amidst Minimum Wage Debate and Infrastructure Projects
subtitle: Report automatically generated on 2026-01-12 by the Trade Section, EU Delegation to Colombia
summary:
Colombia's economic landscape is marked by significant activity, including a debate over the minimum wage increase and its impact on various sectors like housing and restaurants.

The government is proposing new regulations for Social Interest Housing (VIS) to prevent price indexing to the minimum wage and has set price caps in pesos.

Furthermore, discussions around administration fees for residential complexes are ongoing, with the president urging cost control. Economic experts offer forecasts for 2026, including interest rates and inflation.

Infrastructure development is also highlighted with significant budget execution for projects in Bogotá. Meanwhile, international relations are active with discussions on Venezuela and security cooperation.

Notable events include a proposed joint military operation against the ELN involving the US and Venezuela, and ongoing legal proceedings and criticisms regarding government contracts [[REF:07d8b6b2-ce6b-47c4-9217-30b32fb41cb1]][[REF:0adb4ca2-b001-4c2c-a82a-6b420b786a90]][[REF:0b37112f-819f-441e-b7f8-1290ac148f0a]][[REF:12cd82d2-4ec1-49da-9c0f-6102d05ac521]][[REF:1c27a6a8-62e5-4dd1-a4aa-d460b7dd0516]][[REF:261befe7-e6be-41fc-a542-f1ddc70d2422]][[REF:44f116e2-ddcf-43dc-b240-f220af093a78]][[REF:47c1bae6-f870-4c5e-a631-69917280514a]][[REF:584ccfa8-d455-4562-8dfd-c8061f5431df]][[REF:77f5c0bea-958a-4e9f-b785-dcf675841a6a]][[REF:8a15a87e-df89-4399-afd3-2180aa06a23c]][[REF:8b1ec07c-3604-4a33-805e-eb32e51e8512]][[REF:93a38ab5-31f6-44b5-b4ea-e2f2e2d763e5]][[REF:9fd3dcb7-7469-4e1f-9239-87b4f9baacb4]][[REF:a34d4c2f-bd60-442b-87f5-beda816c743d]][[REF:dae10def-863d-4a21-a151-21aed3d695ba]][[REF:d7d5fce9-4fdf-4ba9-b94e-006a702fb2f1]].

sections.title: Economic Policy and Sectoral Impacts
sections.body:
Colombia's economy is grappling with the implications of a significant 23% increase in the minimum wage for 2026, a move that is expected to ripple through various sectors. The government has responded by proposing new regulations aimed at stabilizing the housing market, specifically for Social Interest Housing (VIS). A draft decree intends to prevent VIS prices from being indexed to the minimum wage, requiring prices to be set in Colombian pesos and establishing price caps, with provisions to protect existing contracts [[REF:0efea05a-a950-4a24-a476-69786837741a]][[REF:4cd41845-7a5d-4f49-896e-db2b9127cdf4]][[REF:77f5c0bea-958a-4e9f-b785-dcf675841a6a]][[REF:89c612ef-1c90-4326-aa81-547e5925e3b8]].

Restaurants are also feeling the pressure, with industry leaders warning of potential closures, menu changes, and layoffs due to increased payroll costs stemming from the minimum wage hike and inflation [[REF:677d8039-b38f-4caa-bf17-eea4e821795d]]. The popular "corrientazo" lunch could see price increases as businesses try to balance costs [[REF:e0e09746-23f8-4184-b6f4-85e4d9753d98]].

Economic experts surveyed by Fedesarrollo anticipate interest rates to conclude 2026 at 9.25%, with ongoing concerns about inflation [[REF:1b637b3c-dc79-426e-8112-cd22b041bfee]][[REF:475caf6f-7738-446a-9650-5c516a0651fd]]. The real increase in the minimum wage, after accounting for inflation, is projected at 17.9% [[REF:51560711-334c-410f-a8ee-760d0d16291f]]. The DIAN has published the tax calendar for January 2026, outlining various declaration and payment deadlines for businesses and individuals [[REF:dae10def-863d-4a21-a151-21aed3d695ba]].

sections.title: Infrastructure and Urban Development
sections.body:
The Urban Development Institute (IDU) reported its highest budget execution rate in over a decade for 2025, reaching 88.26%. This achievement has secured funding for infrastructure projects across Bogotá, including the approval of future allocations for new works and the enablement of road and public space interventions [[REF:5620bbaa-cc8f-4840-ac11-ddd30b23fc9f]].

In a significant development for the city's mobility, the Mayor of Bogotá, Carlos Fernando Galán, announced the completion of the concrete structure for the southern vehicular bridge at Primera de Mayo with 68. This project is considered crucial for Line 1 of the Bogotá Metro [[REF:e6a81692-cdce-44c9-b160-ab004e6bba05]][[REF:ef330444-d285-4a06-b4ab-67310d83c289]].

sections.title: International Relations and Security
sections.body:
International relations remain a key focus, with reports indicating that the United States, Venezuela, and Colombia are coordinating a joint military operation against the ELN in Venezuelan territory, involving advanced surveillance and monitoring [[REF:44f116e2-ddcf-43dc-b240-f220af093a78]]. The Colombian Minister of Defense highlighted that strengthening ties with the US will enhance efforts against drug trafficking [[REF:261befe7-e6be-41fc-a542-f1ddc70d2422]].

Colombian Chancellor Rosa Villavicencio stated that both Colombia and the United States share an interest in Venezuela's well-being, following a call between Presidents Gustavo Petro and Donald Trump [[REF:d3e899d6-caef-45e3-b040-4c7fabe984a5]][[REF:d3e899d6-caef-45e3-b040-4c7fabe984a5]]. The US has also warned Cuba about the economic repercussions of its involvement in Venezuela, citing Cuba's dependence on Venezuelan oil [[REF:0b37112f-819f-441e-b7f8-1290ac148f0a]].

In a separate development, President Petro and former US President Donald Trump appear to be entering a period of truce with a potential meeting in sight, raising questions about the implications for bilateral relations [[REF:0d99ca5b-3d62-453e-a1bf-7791aee5e98d]]. The Ministry of Defense has also revealed security implications for Colombia regarding the indefinite presence of the US in Venezuela [[REF:5765ea66-dafc-4bd3-9a9e-82ab81860454]].

sections.title: Political Developments and Governance
sections.body:
Political discourse is active, with President Gustavo Petro responding to accusations from former Interior Vice Minister Rafael Nieto Loaiza, defending his administration's security record by highlighting a reduction in homicide rates [[REF:07175cb8-7f4a-4a79-b948-4fbd35b6683b]]. Petro also addressed criticism regarding a controversial government contract for his defense in relation to the Clinton List, drawing sharp remarks from political opponents [[REF:07175cb8-7f4a-4a79-b948-4fbd35b6683b]][[REF:47c1bae6-f870-4c5e-a631-69917280514a]][[REF:584ccfa8-d455-4562-8dfd-c8061f5431df]][[REF:61663850-99f7-4838-8168-dc5f870226cc]][[REF:93f64cca-39f5-41d2-ba5e-ca0ba4cb6e73]][[REF:52ca7064-50ca-45a9-a598-9dfbead7f1eb]].

The upcoming congressional elections on March 8th are being discussed with concerns about potential terrorist influence and the need for congressional support and strong ties with the United States [[REF:1c27a6a8-62e5-4dd1-a4aa-d460b7dd0516]]. International observation missions are expected to monitor these elections [[REF:4d5ddbc3-3a33-4061-8b43-27da64d7d998]].

In legal news, the Supreme Court has expanded protection for pre-pensioners to prevent dismissals [[REF:03f10ce7-e799-4b91-a4d5-864ae5ca4976]]. Separately, a new raid targeting shell companies linked to a VAT cartel resulted in 11 arrests [[REF:1c5f5b10-4ce9-445d-85f5-881087819afb]]. The JEP president commented that ending the JEP would constitute impunity for victims and create doubt for future peace processes [[REF:03184b7d-fe95-41b3-9a48-9904764ef028]].

sections.title: Financial Markets and Investment Climate
sections.body:
The global financial landscape saw the Mexican peso slightly depreciate following weaker US employment data, while the stock market reached new record highs [[REF:d4b21ee0-a883-43b9-a5ca-ceff54a8e52b]]. The price of oil is projected to fall below $60 in 2026 due to oversupply and slowing demand, with potential for a rebound [[REF:4db8d69c-62e3-4325-a18c-d9a7e95bc9dd]].

Treasury bills (TES) have become a focal point in Colombia due to public debate over alleged anomalies and high interest rates in recent debt operations [[REF:556e1dab-290f-4773-ad4f-152666a55615]]. The fintech unicorn Stori received authorization from Colombia's Financial Superintendence to establish operations, marking a significant expansion for the company [[REF:8b1ec07c-3604-4a33-805e-eb32e51e8512]].
